titleStmt.title: A view of some exceptions which have been made by a Romanist to the Ld Viscount Falkland's discourse Of the infallibility of the Church of Rome submitted to the censure of all sober Christians : together with the discourse itself of infallibility prefixt to it.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.
Falkland, Lucius Cary, Viscount, 1610?-1643. Of the infallibility of the Church of Rome.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for R. Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
